Hi ,

They are both abstract classes =C2=A0. How will they solve my purpose=
 ?
Please help!

Thanks


________________________________
 From: Noah Levi=
tt <nlevitt@...>
To: "archive-crawler@yahoogroups.com" <archive-cra=
wler@yahoogroups.com> 
Sent: Tuesday, July 23, 2013 6:49 AM
Subject: Re: [a=
rchive-crawler] Keep Alive
 


=C2=A0 
Take a look at UriPrecedencePolicy a=
nd QueuePrecedencePolicy. You might be able to achieve your crawl ordering =
goals without writing any code, but if you do need code, those might be the=
 right place to hook in custom modules.

Noah
